metadata.synopsis: Two dwarven locals discuss the business opportunities coming with the refugees: cheap labor begging for something to do, that's gotta be worth something! This is the Dwarf02's one-liner.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to -5; 57; -99- Talk to dwarf 02 of the Business is Business vignette.

0.speaker: Solras
0.text: If my friend tries to get you to 'invest', kindly turn her down. She doesn't need the encouragement.

1.speaker: Solras
1.text: If I hear one more pitch for a 'new business', I'm going to scream.
